title: Dreams
description: Sometimes dreams can be so intense that they feel like reality.Just after Noah arrived, the dreams started, and each night, they became more intense as Ethan became more submissive to his dream dominator. When he falls asleep, the master takes control of his mind and body, giving him unimaginable pleasure. But why is Ethan having these Dreams?Ethan has always used his shyness as the reason behind his lack of interest in women, which is why he is still a virgin at twenty-four. When a new guy starts work in his office, Ethan is intrigued by the stories he tells him about an exclusive club he visits at weekends.Eventually, he asks Noah to take him to the club. Will what Ethan finds change his life forever?As dreams become a reality at the club, is Ethan ready for the experience?
author: B.J. Smyth
